name: The Escape (Demo)
description:
Help Johnny Jones Junior to escape, but.....from where?.

Who is Johnny J.J. and where does he have to escape from?. Help him in this adventure to discover a surprising ending.

Hi. I am David Trikeman and this is a demo of my first Indie game. I hope you enjoin it.

All feedbacks are welcome. Please, be polite and respectful.
